page.title: 11GAINFORD'S GUIDE COMPANY
page.content: { {Being a Guide.}In Gainford there is a Cub, Scout, Brownie and Guide company. Guides is held on Wednesday night between 6 and 8 p.m. At Guides they play games, cook and occasionally they go camping and sleep in the Guide hut. At special times in the year they attend services in local churches and chapels. This year it is the{Guides' {75th anniversary}and Gainford Guide company is attending a service at{Raby {Castle. The Guide uniform consists of a blue blouse with a yellow tie, a blue hat and a blue skirt, or blue trousers. At Guides they are split up into four groups called the{Robins, Kingfishers, {Nightingales and Swallows.}The group leader is in charge of the whole group and she organises all the activities.
